Text: Oh yeah, thanks for your contributions over the years.

Pay no mind good chescus.  jshgib123, Lexius49 and agking are afflicted by the menses, and will likely come to their senses in a few days time.  This is the ASAP release.  Besides, HM has uploaded 300+ torrents in the last year alone and has the well-deserved jolly roger to boot.  He simply forgot to tell us to, "ENJOY Breaking Bad S05E08 by ASAP".

Apparently that makes all the difference in the world.
